price: Mereka akan bersumpah kepadamu agar kamu rida kepada mereka.  Tetapi jika sekiranya kamu rida kepada mereka, maka sesungguhnya Allah tidak rida kepada orang-orang yang fasik itu.
arabic: يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ لِتَرۡضَوۡاْ عَنۡهُمۡۖ فَإِن تَرۡضَوۡاْ عَنۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَرۡضَىٰ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍaw ʿanhum fa-in tarḍaw ʿanhum fa-inna al-laha lā yarḍā ʿani al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
